name: Roll Runner (Leeding Apps)
description:
"Roll Runner" is a platformer where you must collect all the coins before the time runs out to complete the level. There are 10 levels to complete. Touching a die will add a random modifier to the player. These modifiers will change your speed, jump height or size. You can only have one modifier at a time. You will need to use the dice to your advantage.

Please Note: There are a few glitches but that is to be expected when making a game in 48 hours.

Keyboard Controls

Player 1:

Move Left: Left Arrow
Move Right: Right Arrow
Jump: Up Arrow

Player 2:

2 Player mode is broken and I didn't have time to fix it.
(Player 2 is controlled via a gamepad)
The screen will split into 2

Restart: Space Key

Development

Created by Daniel Lee

Developed for the "GMTK 2022" game jam

Theme: Roll of The Dice (16/Jul - 18/Jul)

Developed with Unity for my second game jam. There are some imperfections and glitches as this was made in just 48 hours.
